name: MPNowPlayingSessionDelegate
desc: A protocol that defines the delegate interface for a Now Playing session.

items.name: func nowPlayingSessionDidChangeActive(MPNowPlayingSession)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the session changed its active status.

items.name: func nowPlayingSessionDidChangeCanBecomeActive(MPNowPlayingSession)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the session is eligible to become active.
